Reviews.Title: Value Camera...take caution on accessories.
Reviews.Author: BeckyBoo
Reviews.Content: Received a fair market price of base camera, but take caution with aftermarket accessories which most are not OEM product and sub-standard. Fore example, extra 3rd-party battery is mislabeled for orientation, camera case does not fight (too tight and forget about adding an extra SD flash or battery). Positives are the 64GB SDXC UHS-I SD Sony OEM memory card (SF-64UY), and the portable tripod and cleaning accessories are fine.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Family of Five
Reviews.Content: One of the best cameras for it's size and zoom.  It is very advanced has great features that depending on how well a photographer you are you can turn them on or off.  one feature i love is using your android phone to take a picture through the camera.

Reviews.Title: SONY  DSC-HX50  GREAT camera at a great price package
Reviews.Author: A. J. Gnoza "polishsumgai"
Reviews.Content: Excellent dealer, GREAT package deal,  Sony camera is far superior than the competition and is rated top camera in a number of site.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Barb Kneer
Reviews.Content: I've only used this camera a short time, but am really impressed with picture quality and ease to use it. The only complaint is that the case sent with this package is too small for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Moriamez Moreno
Reviews.Content: I been using the camera for just 3 days. The camera looks nice.This are my complains:1- Bad packing from provider, the cleaning solution is bad packed and was puncture or something: the tripod, the SD protect, the screen protection are all wet and useless and sticky.2 Manuals: Sony can be jocking. I understand if this camera were cheap with no full manual but is not. Why the full manual is not there. I do not want to pay more for an already expensive camera. it does not make sense to me.3 Camera Case. This is another joke, the case is useless. with 2 batteries and the camera is no way to close the zip. IT IS TOO SMALL. What are FOCUS guys thinking. Just looking the case profile can see it will not fit.The SD memory is good, with 64gb is more than enough for movies and pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Daniel Ibanez
Reviews.Content: its my second sony cyber shot. i use to have na equal one but i get robbed.already fan of this product

Reviews.Title: Not a great zoom and no view finder
Reviews.Author: victoria b
Reviews.Content: Can't really see what you taking a pic of in bright light. There is no view finder. The digital screen is not adjustable and you CANNOT see it of you are shooting in the sun or in bright outdoor light. We took this camera on a 6 week vacation in Africa a regretted every second. We have always had sony cameras and been ultra pleased with their performance. We have used the automatic SLR type. This was recommended because of the WIFI and Bluetooth capabilities for downloading to phones or computers or sharing. It's VERY difficult!!!! We HATE this camera. Our pics from our smart phones are better, and it doesn't work well in low light either.

Reviews.Title: Great Package! Delivered as promised!
Reviews.Author: TC "Hedgehog"
Reviews.Content: No compromise in this fully loaded package deal! Items came pre-packed in a single box and the contents were as described. While the camera bag is snug it fits well and ensures camera remains safe.  The contents were provided as described an the extra battery addition was greatly appreciated.  The camera works well but time will tell on its functionality and all purpose use.

Reviews.Title: Beat my exceptations
Reviews.Author: Johnny L Parsons Jr
Reviews.Content: The camera and accompanying kit provide all I needed to use the camera. It has a larger display. The user manual is part of camera's software. In truth the camera's software is extremely useful. It allows you to do post production work on the fly. It also helps a lot when you use the camera in its manual setting. In its automatic setting it does everything for you. The camera fitted in my front jeans pocket without a major bulge. The camera is thicker and heavier than my iPhone 4 with its Otterbox case, The picture quality is good. I was able to take a picture of the moon in in the evening sun with the zoom lens and was able to see the major craters and seas. I was not able to get the same results with only moon light. I got exceptional results during the daytime, and evening  with all settings. The flash works well in all appropriate settings. The 30 optical zoom is extraordinary.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: C. M. Wolf "Christel"
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest camera.High quality pictures and videos. They are so many things you can do, so reading the manual is a must.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: This camera package is a great value, the quality of the camera is great. Unfortunately the camera did not come with a wrist strap and the spare battery did not come in the package as listed. Camera takes great pictures and the case fits the camera well. The camera appears new, with no scratches.

Reviews.Title: Accessory package issues
Reviews.Author: Lynn D.
Reviews.Content: Received the camera package quickly.  Everything advertised was included but the carrying case that was provided is not big enough to get the camera in it.  So this package has a major default as I was expecting to be able to safely transport the camera in the carrying case.  Very disappointing.  Would love to figure out how to return the case and get something that works.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camers
Reviews.Author: Shakutaiko "Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: Everything specified in the order arrived in a very timely manner.  The camera is exactly as described and is very easy to operate. I have used the charger and it charges very quickly.I like that there is enough room to add a spare battery in the case provided.  I read other reviews where the claim was that the case was too small.  I found the case snug; but not impossible to put the camera into it.I shot some sample pictures of the sunset, and was impressed by the sheer beauty of the color rendition.  I intend to use this camera for travel and tours.My brother-in-law recommended this camera to me, as he uses this as a secondary camera on his job as a wedding photographer.  I now can recommend this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great photos
Reviews.Author: R. Krause
Reviews.Content: This camera takes outstanding pictures.  I've already recommended it to several others and they have also bought it.  It has a user friendly interface like the other Sony cameras I've had but this one is leaps and bounds better when it comes to picture quality.  We just returned from a Christmas trip to Europe and were thrilled with the photos it took.

Reviews.Title: sony camera
Reviews.Author: Frank K. Prosser "frankpross"
Reviews.Content: I like it for the zoom-don't know much about cameras, but this one seems easy to use and takes a quality picture

Reviews.Title: Nice set
Reviews.Author: * "crazy booky mama"
Reviews.Content: Looked for a camera that could do it all from close ups of flowers to distance shots of birds.  Found it.

Reviews.Title: Case did not fit camera
Reviews.Author: A. Erskine
Reviews.Content: The camera works well --great camera and image quality--and all accessories were as advertised; however, the case didn't fit the camera.

Reviews.Title: I like this Sony Camera, but hopefully the missing item Card Reader-Writer will be solved soon.
Reviews.Author: huynh
Reviews.Content: I ordered Sony DSC-HX50V package with the Order #103-5668661-0503463 on 10/30/13 and received this on 11/05/13. Unfortunately there was One Missing Item in this package is Focus Memory Card Reader-writer and I has been contacted to Amazon-Focus Camera  for this problem, Until today I did not receive this missing item yet. I would like Amazon - Focus Camera to solve this problem for me. I am looking forward hearing from you soon.Thank you so much in advance.Happy Holidays Season to You All.

Reviews.Title: Excellent travel camera!
Reviews.Author: William H Farland
Reviews.Content: This Sony HX50v/b camera is easy to use and takes fabulous pictures under a  variety of conditions. Small but powerful!

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera for $$$
Reviews.Author: Tom Kingsley
Reviews.Content: Bought for the bells and whistles of the camera and the convenience of the accessories.  The camera at this time is smarter than me, being old school and liking a comprehensive paper manual.  Great camera, and not  that large, though will not fit in shirt pocket, but does not pretend to.  Could almost use the Mazda commercial tag line  ZOOM  ZOOM

Reviews.Title: Capable mega-zoom
Reviews.Author: CJ "CJ"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer, but I like taking nice pictures.  I really mean different pictures.  I look for perspective, composition, texture, color, and I like to take pictures of sometimes ordinary objects in ways others don't.  So I say all that to imply that I need a pretty versatile camera, and this fits the bill nicely.  It auto-switches to macro mode (at least in some modes), which I use a lot, captures color pretty well, and good in low-light conditions.I like the controls and their placement.  Having the EV knob right on top instead of in a menu is nice.  It has a powerful zoom, it was one of the reasons I got it - that and manual focus.  The only thing bad about it is that, even though I turned off digital zoom on the menu, it still does the digital zoom, and there is no extra click or anything.  Unless you are looking at it, you can easily spill into the digital zoom part.Here are a couple of other cons:- if you are in the super intelligent auto mode, it says "processing..." for about 3 seconds after you take a picture.  You can't take a second picture because the LCD does not show anything while it's processing.  The same is true when you switch modes, it takes several seconds to set up the new mode.- Yes, it does have manual focus but you have to go through the menus to set it.  I would really like to be able to set it on and off with one click, maybe even one more button.  I haven't tried setting the "custom" button to do that, but maybe that would work.All in all, though, I am really pleased with the pictures it takes.  It is very versatile and fits in a pocket.  Can't wait for Spring.

Reviews.Title: Great product, but lens cover system is not functioning
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I think I would give a 5star rating if this anoying cover would work properly. For some strange reason it just don't open by itself. one side seems to have some piece inside not working properly. So I have to open it with my finger, sometimes having to touch the lens, and leaving the marks on it. it looks lide that lid is too close to the lens because it touches it. I am not sure if it is my camera that came defective or what but I will try to see if I can get it checked. Other than that I love the product.The Zoom is a plus, it has a follow focus system that performs decently, some times anoying because you want something in focus but then it chooses something else, but those cases are specific and they happen once on a while.Other than that, it is a great product.

ProductInfo.Features:
20.4-megapixels & 30x optical/60x Clear Image zoom
Full HD 1080/60p with dual record
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way active mode
Up to 10 frames per second
Full manual and dedicated EV control dial and built-in Wi-Fi
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-HX50V/B DSC-HX50, HX50, DSCHX50 Cyber-shot 20.4MP High Zoom Digital Camera + Sony 64GB SDHC Class 10 High Speed SD Card + Focus Memory Card Reader-Writer + Wasabi Power NP-BX1 Spare Battery Pack + Sony Case + Spider Tripod + Accessory Kit
